entry.title: Newly published in CLASSICA DIGITALIA - VNIVERSITATIS CONIMBRIGENSIS
entry.content:
Newly published in CLASSICA DIGITALIA - VNIVERSITATIS CONIMBRIGENSIS
Ana Iriarte & Luísa de Nazaré Ferreira (coords.), Idades e género na literatura e na arte da Grécia antiga (Coimbra and São Paulo, 2015). 215 p.           
DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.14195/978-989-26-1017-7
[Studies about the idea of age and gender in Ancient Greece, with focus on children, elderly, and maidens] Printed copy:  28 €

 José Luís Brandão & Francisco de Oliveira (coords.), História da Roma Antiga I: das origens à morte de César (Coimbra, 2015). 486 p.
DOI:  http://dx.doi.org/10.14195/978-989-26-0954-6
[A history of Rome, from the beginnings to the death of Caesar] Printed copy:  16 €

 Maria de Fátima Silva & Maria das Graças de Moraes Augusto (coords.), A recepção dos Clássicos em Portugal e no Brasil (Coimbra, 2015). 306 p.
DOI:  http://dx.doi.org/10.14195/978-989-26-1043-6
Printed copy: 25€ [Studies on the reception of Greco-Latin themes and models in the literature and culture of Portugal and Brazil.]

link.title: Newly published in CLASSICA DIGITALIA - VNIVERSITATIS CONIMBRIGENSIS
